name: thiever ape
description:
Code by me, textures by me and @zzZuniLxgitUwU (praise him too)

I rushed this game hard, 5 days for the rope and 1 for literally everything else, sorry for the poor quality. I promise to extend the game soon.

I still enjoyed participating though, really gave me an euphoria once I saw myself walking on my tiles and swinging on my ropes.

if you want to use my code or assets, make your own version or just looking around, feel free to download the source tarball: 

https://www.iskamag.com/monkesrc.tgz

Update: made a few refinements, uploaded a windows and web version. I'll make it even better soon, but not now. I need a rest...
